title: Retail revenue from smart wearable devices worldwide 2014 and 2019
yAxis: Retail revenue in billion U.S. dollars
summary: This statistic presents the proportion of cars billion a U.S. dollars system installed in 2014 and 2019 .
The Retail of U.S. dollars system equipped cars increased from 4.5 billion in 2014 to 53.2 billion in 2019 .
